title: Bug Bounty Meetup
description:
A meetup with lightning-talks for Bug Bounty hunters.
'''Warning:''' The Art-and-Play Stage is not available anymore so the location & date/time of the meetup is unsure until another room is found.'''For real time updates about the event, follow me on Twitter: [https://twitter.com/xdavidhu @xdavidhu]''''''Lightning Talks:'''* Sergey Belov - [https://twitter.com/sergeybelove @sergeybelove] - '''''Hints: How to hunt for bounties - Vendor side'''''* Nikhil Mittal - [https://twitter.com/c0d3G33k @c0d3G33k] - '''''[TBD]''''' (Browser research, XSS by scanning QR codes)* Anatoly - [https://twitter.com/c0rv4x @c0rv4x] - '''''Choosing target. Bending the rules. & other tips''''''''No registration / RSVP is required to attend the meetup. If you are interested, feel free to visit.'''
